greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers whose arithmetic derivative is of the form 4k+2, cf. A003415.
comment: All terms are odd because the terms A068719 are either multiples of 4 or odd numbers.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
xref: Cf. A001248 (a subsequence from its second term onward).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 30 2019
